Articles.Content:
Help! I would like to make a Stock System replacement mod, but I don't know how to delete stock system. I would also like to make planets, but when I tried, It wasn't there. How do you make textures for planets? And how do you make asteroids?

Thanks!

To create planets you must install the mod Kopernicus and write a configuration file for the new planet.

The following gives some of the basics on how to use it.  It's a start.

Creating textures is the hard part, at least for me it is.  There are probably some tutorials in the forum, but I can't think of a good one at the moment.

Kopernicus also allows you to delete bodies.  For instance, I think the following will delete all bodies. 

@Kopernicus:AFTER[Kopernicus]
{
	!Body,* {}
}

As for the asteroids...

https://github.com/Kopernicus/KopernicusExamples/blob/master/KopernicusExamples/Asteroid Example.cfg
